participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Reflective and creative, Maya often thinks deeply about her experiences and expresses herself through art and movement.
participant_1.background: I prefer to keep my hair natural. I have two things I love: cookies and my long curly hair. I am a student who is not well-liked. I went through a lot of changes in a short amount of time. I am known as the iron skittler in the skittles universe.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is enthusiastic and driven, always striving to improve and help others while being supportive of his friends.
participant_2.background: I run for my mom. My mom is a checker at the local grocery store. I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change. My family is supportive of me and my dance team. I work as a waitress.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing great! I'm getting ready for my next dance competition.
That's awesome! Are you excited?
Yes! I'm so excited to show off all the hard work I've been putting in.
I'm sure you'll do great! What kind of dance do you do?
I do ballet, jazz, and hip hop.
Wow! That's a lot of different styles.
It is, but I love them all!
Me too! I used to dance when I was younger.
Really? What kind of dance did you do?
I did ballet and tap.
That's awesome! I wish I had started dancing when I was younger.
Me too! It's such a great way to stay active and have fun.
I agree! It's also a great way to meet new people.
That's true! I met some of my best friends through dance.
I'm so glad I joined the dance team! It's been a great experience.
I'm sure you'll do great at your competition!
Thank you! I'm really excited.
Good luck!
Thanks
